website_summaries.verdict: Melissa & Doug toys are known for being informative as well as entertaining. This house is aesthetically pleasing with bright colors and a playful outside design.
pros: The house helps to develop children's imaginations, social skills, and open-ended play
It includes a working mail slot, illustrated tire swing, and vegetable garden
cons: The house is made from corrugated cardboard, so it's not as sturdy as some other options

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE! UPDATE: ABRASION ON MY SON'S FACE
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed on Christmas. Thin cardboard. It’s so thin that it causes cuts. Not what I expected from a Melissa and Doug product. I wish I could return but it would be too much hassle to send it back after assembling. Update: January 2019 The thin cardboard caused an abrasion on my son's face. Right above his nose. It has now been over a month and clearly it's going to leave a horrible scar. DO NOT BUY! I will be contacting the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Little House!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely ADORE this little house! For the price point it is AWESOME! I mean, when you think about it, those cardboard wardrobe moving boxes are like $20! That is what my 2-year old daughter was playing in before I purchased the house. Ha! It is a bit of a pain to assemble...I would definitely recommend doing it with another person. Makes it a lot easier. One other thing to note is that it doesn't have a floor. But I have a little bath rug that I bought for it...BOOM....wall-to-wall carpeting. LOLOL. My daughter LOVES it. I bought metallic alphabet stickers and put her name over the front door. Just a little something extra : )
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO ADORABLE!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter! Very well constructed to be made out of cardboard, it’s very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still holding up after many months of play
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this little house for our son, so he could have a quiet place that was ONLY for him. He loved it from the moment he saw it, and kept climbing in before it was completely done! He's been using it every day since, and it's been many months now. The house still looks great. It was definitely worth the money for all the fun he's had. It could be put together by one person but it's easier with two people. Some of the little tabs are tricky, but if you stay very methodical and careful, you can get it together and sturdy fast. It took us about 15 minutes total to get it done.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Lee

customer_reviews.title: I assembled it myself and it was relatively easy to do so
customer_reviews.text: My son and I go in here during his nighttime routine every night to read books. I assembled it myself and it was relatively easy to do so, even with a toddler jumping on all the pieces as I was assembling it. Do exercise caution as I ended up with a minor paper cut after wards. Also when fully assembled this doesn't fit through a standard sized door frame, so I would assemble in the space this will stay. Very well made and sturdy, excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: ss569

customer_reviews.title: Good and Sturdy...but requires patience
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy but because of that it takes time and patience to put up...and if you want to be able to put it up and take it down for shorter periods of time (like when the grandkids visit),...have patience. LOTS of stiff tabs to bend, but that's what makes it so sturdy! I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RPN

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and my grandson loved it
customer_reviews.text: This house is so cute for toddlers, the only issue is I wish is was easier to disassemble so you can take it down easier . It takes up a lot of space and won't fit through most homes hallways or doors. So where ever you put it together, plan on it staying there. But it is cute, sturdy and my grandson loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Gentile

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Bigger and Better than expected! Quick and easy to put together, great quality and the kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: WARNING SHARP EDGES CAUSE SERIOUS CUTS
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying we loved this cheaper alternative to the known brand plastic house. It cost a fraction of the price and is just as fun. However, the house should come with a warning label. The edges are sharp and could cause serious cuts. My two year old was playing in the house when suddenly she ran to me with blood dripping from her toe. I asked her what happened and she pointed to the house. Weeks later I went to pick up the house and accidentally cut my finger on the window. Please take precautions when letting your child play with the house. I recommend using tape or a hot glue gun to shield off the edges.
customer_reviews.author: Barron

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhhh. Sucks to assemble but cute.
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly cute. BUT it was SO FRIGGIN frustrating to put it together. You will need to put it together in the room you want obviously but you need a lot of floor space. On top of that it is the equivalent of folding like 300 pizza boxes. There are definitely some flaws in the cardboard. The front window was especially beat up on ours. Overall, it is wonderful and worth the money, time and effort vs other playhouses that are $200+.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaKat

customer_reviews.title: My grandaughter just love it.
customer_reviews.text: My grandaughter just love it... she takes all her stuff animals and blankets and sleep in it... my daughter has it set up in the home . How nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable playhouse for it being cardboard
customer_reviews.text: After reading lots of reviews on this playhouse we decided to purchase one rather than one of those expensive plastic or wood ones for our Lil one for Christmas. Fairly easy to assemble, I say fairly because I would advise not trying to assemble it after too much "cider" on Christmas Eve with your spouse LoL Our daughter loves this playhouse and has been enjoying playing in it with her cousins, actually very durable considering it's cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: ꜱɪx8ᴋᴀᴛᴇ  - ᴋᴀᴛᴇɪꜱᴀ

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Our 2,5yo loves her own house! It's been a hit among all the Christmas presents. She plays with it non-stop and already brought almost all her toys in there. Well, on a negative note, it's been only 2 weeks of use, and the doors are already ripped from the bottom for about 4 inches or so... We are not too worried though, I feel like the price is appropriate for this sturdiness. We'll pretty much wait until this one is destroyed and will probably get her another one. I don't think you can expect much from a cardboard  ̄\_(ツ)_/ ̄ You do need two people to assemble it. And probably a bottle of wine.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only 5 days!
customer_reviews.text: I only bought this cause it’s cheaper than plastic playhouses. Boi do I regret it now, and wish I bought a plastic one in the first place that’s sturdy and going to last longer! I have been Melissa and doug’s customer for a while and their products have never disappointed me up until now. Assembling is pretty easy and it’s a cute house. But not worth $50 plus tax, for a cardboard that’s going to last only few days, especially if you have boys (I have a 3 yr old). Overall, it’s cute house, BUT NOT WORTH $50 for what?! A cardboard?!
customer_reviews.author: Tenzin Dechen

customer_reviews.title: Cute. Durable. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble. Cute little cardboard playhouse, sturdy and good price. My only concern is my 3 yr old got a cardboard cut on his neck when looking out the playhouse window. I aslo got cut during assembly. To be expected though. Just be careful. Fun addition for my toddlers. They love it! And it's very spacious on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Miles

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this little cardboard house. It's bright and cheerful and sturdy. It was simple to put together. We had cardboard play structures in the past, so we used packing tape to hold the flaps in place after connecting to make it last even longer. The inside is blank white, but I think I'll let the kids paint on decorations. My 2 year old daughter loves her own house.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it's a winner. Tabs are broken, cardboard seemed weak in spots (bending in the wrong spots) we had to use a lot of box tape to close the gaps. Easy to put together and Super cute design but no doubt it will be tore up in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Well made playhouse for a wild preschooler.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this house. He mostly likes to pretend it's a store and sells me his toys through the window. It's pretty well made, and can stand up to a rambunctious four year old. It also doesn't take up a ton of space. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Lytle

customer_reviews.title: Cute, fun little house!
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year old loves this house! It was easy to assemble and as sturdy as expected for a cardboard house. It looks cute too! It did come with wax for the exposed edges to prevent paper cuts, and so far the wax has worked well. The outside of the house isn't particularly easy to color (a bonus), but the inside is white, leaving lots of opportunity for customization.
customer_reviews.author: H Layton

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 14 month old grandson LOVES this playhouse. He plays with it the entire time he is here. It was pretty easy to put together. It took my husband about 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: andrew&melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not the sturdiest but very fun
customer_reviews.text: So it’s a cardboard house and not very thick cardboard either; the Amazon boxes are much thicker. Once the house is together it’s fairly study, but we are planning on adding some thicker cardboard soon. My son LOVES it! He could hardly wait when we were putting it together and is still enjoying it a week later, which is good for him.
customer_reviews.author: Hollydazzle

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 4 year old granddaughter. She loves it. Requires 2 people to put together, I'm old, a young flexible person might be ok.
customer_reviews.author: TXAZ

customer_reviews.title: Cute and just as described
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, just as described. Might need a pillow or blanket to throw under. My 2 year old loves it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kat in the hat

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money! We are very disappointed. It’s hard to put together and not durable at all. I can’t believe I paid money for nothing but a nice loooking cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Mainly for use indoors, but we use it outdoors on nice days.
customer_reviews.text: Cute house. My granddaughter loves it. Although she’s not quite 2 yrs. old, she has to duck to fit thru the door. Took a good hour plus to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Magstag

customer_reviews.title: The edges are pretty sharp
customer_reviews.text: I applied tisco tape on all the edges so that an accidental bump on the edge doesn't result in an injury; nonetheless, my baby got bruises on her hand when she was just playing with the window.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Fun Cardboard playhouse
customer_reviews.text: Toddler enjoys it. Happy that it is a more temporary feature for playroom, we considered this and plastic play houses but did not want the commitment of a hard playhouse we’d need to keep in our playroom for years to come. It is definitely cardboard though so make sure you aren’t looking for something more heavy duty!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Reinforced with tape and used the box it came with as floor (taped it to the cardboard floor). Used shelf lining paper on the floor to hide cardboard. Put battery operated lights on the ceiling - looks cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_user

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for apartment living
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves to play in boxes §o I know she would like it when I saw it! We live in an apartment so we dont have a place for an outdoor play house. I swas correct....she loves this gift from Santa. She has all her stuffed animals in it right now and even a silky sheep skin rug for sleeping!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The front part was damaged. My 3 year old was completely disappointed. Took almost half an hour to assemble, it will take more to dissemble and return. Not worth the time. First time really disappointed with Melissa and Doug!
customer_reviews.author: AbhiNiv

customer_reviews.title: Nice playhouse made from heavyweight cardboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice heavy-weight cardboard house for kids. It went together in about a half-hour. We taped battery-operated LED lights to the inside and made a fun playhouse. This is an excellent quality product that will stand up to the rigors of a four-year-old
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Great kid hideaway
customer_reviews.text: Great house for kids. My son in law did get a paper cut, just like the reviews said, even though I earned him. But it went together well after that. It's a little dark inside but a string of lights fixed that.
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: As suspected, my 18 mo. old granddaughter just loves this playhouse. It’s inexpensive and can just be recycled when she outgrows it. It’s very colorful and is sturdy enough for her to play with the doors and windows.
customer_reviews.author: R. Tholen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy house, Missed chimney...
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived on time, was delivered by UPS, it came with an small tear in the front, however, for someone like me with zero skills assemble was super easy, the instructions are easy to follow. My son loves it, the only thing is I was expecting it to be bigger, my son is 2 and he doesn't fit in the front door. Also it didnt came with the chimney. One good thing was the wax block, very useful, I recommend to smooth the edges before your kid play with it. I had a small cut while assembling it, however the wax smooths the edges very well. My son loves it. I will continue buying Mellisa and Doug
customer_reviews.author: Zahir villar

customer_reviews.title: Buy this for hours of indoor play!
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love this cottage. I bought it for our indoor quarantine and it was such a great deal. The edges are rough because it’s like made out of corrugated cardboard (i think). I used clear packing tape to protect them from sharp edges and re-enforce all the doors and windows. It’s a must buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Garfield

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but bulky and very sharp edges.
customer_reviews.text: The house is beautiful and my 5 yr old loves it BUT it is HUGE. it occupies enormous amount of space. The house is extremely difficult to put together...definitely not a one person job. The cardboard edges are very sharp and my daughter gets scraped every time she plays in it (but that hasnt stopped her!)... Overall very inviting for a kid but could have been made slightly better...
customer_reviews.author: Maithili S.

customer_reviews.title: Missing the correct piece.
customer_reviews.text: Not holding up the best. Received 2 of the exact same side (missing the left side of the house and got 2 right sides) so the house didn’t come together the way it should. Would send back, but it would be more work than its worth.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when to use it
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and good idea to make a house using cardboards I want to point out a safety hazard that your kids may fall down inside by leaning the card board wall. You migt want to put something which it can hold the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO BUILD
customer_reviews.text: WE BOUGHT THIS AWESOME HOUSE FOR MY GRANDDAUGHTER'S 3RD BIRTHDAY. SHE LOVES THE WORKING WINDOWS, DOORS AND WE ADDED BATTERY OPERATED TWINKLE LIGHTS ON THE INTERIOR CEILING THAT JUST DELIGHTED HER. SHE LOVES PLAYING FAST FOOD RESTAURANT WITH THE WORKING WINDOW FLAPS. I'M SURE SHE'LL USE THIS FOR YEARS TO COME!
customer_reviews.author: Juli

customer_reviews.title: Good but beware of paper cuts
customer_reviews.text: While the product is sturdy, colorful and entertaining to my 2 year old, it does take some time and energy to assemble.. and gives paper cuts to whoever plays with it.... that said it's price point is perfect and the ability to disassemble is good.
customer_reviews.author: Bhavya S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Has kept my kiddo very entertained in the week we've had it. I kinda expected it to be sturdier but it is cardboard after all. It was easy to put together by myself to be ready when my son came home from day care to a surprise. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Barney

customer_reviews.title: Loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Granddaughters Christmas . She’s almost 4, loves it and can stand up in it..the box it comes in is probably 4’ tall.. Big.
customer_reviews.author: P. Beauvais

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp edges, hard to assemble, bad quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is not worth $50. Very bad quality, very flimsy, thin cardboard with very sharp edges that can cause serious cuts. I cut my finger when I was assembling it, and my 4-year old daughter cut her finger so badly when she was opening/closing the door of the playhouse. It is such pain to assemble it. I spent 30 minutes trying to attach pieces together. Cheap quality Chinese product! Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Aussie

customer_reviews.title: Quality playhouse for the price.
customer_reviews.text: All the required pieces were included. All the pieces fit together perfectly. Very sturdy cardboard. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Looks cute, but not worth the headache of assembling when a child can take it apart in minutes.
customer_reviews.text: I typically love Melissa and Doug products... This, not so much. Horrible experience with building the house, & the directions sounded like a toddler with little to no knowledge of English wrote them. It took over 4 hours of assembling the house, and waxing every corner and edge with the bar of wax included. It looks cute, but it's not durable and it's a pain to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett family

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Playhouse
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter is going to absolutely love this.We can not wait to see her with this beautiful playhouse.Bought this for Christmas .Definitely a 5 plus,plus rating .Very fast shipping !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old niece instantly fell in love with the cottage
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old niece instantly fell in love with the cottage. She spends lots of time playing in it. And it was easy to have it shipped to her..
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: House
customer_reviews.text: This is just absolutely fabulous my kids love it and the size is just perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this house so much that we have bought it twice. They are rough on it but it still lasts a year! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Glad we bought it
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and quite sturdy, which I wasn’t sure about because it is cardboard. Of course it is still cardboard nonetheless but my 3 1/2-year-old grandson gets a big kick out of it. Uses it as his doctors office. We put a sign on the front making it his special office and he sees his patients with his doctor kit. We bought two dollar store lights he can flip on, and put them inside. Very fun.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and good value for money
customer_reviews.text: This house is very pretty. It is fairly easy to assemble. My kid loved it right away. One small minus is that it is a little too light and can be moved around by the kid.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Ghazaryan

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: Great!!!!! My 3 kids play with this daily. We taped colored lights inside and added a little couch lol they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer412

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It was a great gift for our girl. She loved it. Doesn’t play with it now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Williams

customer_reviews.title: Durable and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My two-year-old son plays in this house for hours. It is much more durable than other cardboard houses that we have had in the past. Nothing but great things to say about it!
customer_reviews.author: Breanne Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and kids love the colorful house
customer_reviews.text: I decorated the inside of the playhouse for a 1 year old granddaughter and she and her friends love it! Was easy to work with and I was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Adams

customer_reviews.title: Makes the best little playhouse.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little home for my 2 year old great granddaughter. Put a real soft blanket inside to use for the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Cute in door house!
customer_reviews.text: It looks beautiful and appears to be sturdy. I went ahead and reinforced it with tape. Excited for my kids to play in it.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: playhouse
customer_reviews.text: exactly like I was expecting.. Good sturdy cardboard. would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Good trial
customer_reviews.text: Good trial of a playhouse for my kids who are 2 &4 but it's cardboard and although they loved it my girls are kind of rough lol and it only held up to their playing for 3 weeks top. Overall I liked the product and my girls did too
customer_reviews.author: kaneshia

customer_reviews.title: Fun playhouse
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my three year old grandson. He loves to play in boxes so I figured this would be a lot of fun for him. I was right. He totally loves to climb in. ( The cats also like to sleep in it)
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jones

customer_reviews.title: So much fun to spot all the different animals and plants! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this house. Our little one uses it to play, read books and gets some solitude from the roomba -which she is not a fan of.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Bright and colorful!
customer_reviews.text: This playhouse is very nice! Bright and colorful! It is large and will take up quite a bit of space. My daughter loves it’
customer_reviews.author: Matt Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I put this together in less than an hour. It is sturdier than I thought it would be. So far it has held up well to my one year old. Perfect addition to his play space at my office.
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction for price
customer_reviews.text: Very bright colors and quality conatruction for the price. Great gift for my grandchildren. Assembly was easy but takes two pairs of hands to work best.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Terry

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her little cottage! Its very cute and pretty sturdy for just being cardboard!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Hailey

customer_reviews.title: A great buy for my child
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. My 4 year old son loves it. Everyone who visits our home has been in this house of his. Great size and beautiful presentation. It is very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Leon J

customer_reviews.title: Cute house
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves this house. Made from thick cardboard. Pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: sandra innis

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about the cardboard edges as seen in other reviews but it came with some kind of glue stick to soften. It fits my one year old, Pomeranian and I (5’7) comfortably for story time. Great upgrade from my makeshift stroller box house !!!
customer_reviews.author: Blanca cortes

customer_reviews.title: Adorable + Easy
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest little house. Very self-explanatory assembly. Took about 15-29 minutes. My nieces and nephew loved it! The cute little mail slot in the door had them writing “letters” to each other. It was so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Time

customer_reviews.title: Fun house
customer_reviews.text: Instant hit with the nephews and niece. Now visits with us are fun for the kids too. I chose this house rather than the food truck hoping it would be easier to assemble but it still took my husband about 2 hours to put together and then a second person to finish it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Easily destroyed. This is not for children under 3. It not last.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while to assemble, but ends up being quite sturdy. My 4 year old granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Zman

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. It did not stand well after couple of weeks my kids played. I could not return just because it was lot of time to de assemble and box it again. Not worth the time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Prashant

customer_reviews.title: Fun playhouse
customer_reviews.text: We play in this all the time with the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced Cardboard! Tears easily!
customer_reviews.text: After my 4 year old played with the house ONE time, it ripped! For $50, I thought I would get a more quity product.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old sleeps in this every night!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this...play in it, sleep in it. Seems pretty sturdy. The only thing that has torn is right beside the door openings from my daughter kicking the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Kari E.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves cardboard boxes so you can imagine his excitement when he saw this Christmas morning! Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy and well worh the money
customer_reviews.text: Really good purchase. Very sturdy inspite of many kids playing around in it. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: punters

customer_reviews.title: Check to make sure you have the right pieces when you receive it!!!
customer_reviews.text: We received two front doors and no back panel with the chimney. Pretty bummed out since we were putting it together for Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: Coachm

customer_reviews.title: Not great!!!
customer_reviews.text: It came damaged but able to assemble but definitely will not last long :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Has held up surprisingly well for the past four months with a very busy 2 year old.. my child and I play with it almost daily
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Mehlbaum

customer_reviews.title: Worth of the money :)
customer_reviews.text: Really happy about this little house. My 5 yr old is enjoying her playtime with this...
customer_reviews.author: Subashree

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 grandgirls love this house! They play in it all the time. A great value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: This has withstood all five of my children and hasn’t budged a bit! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: bmp0616

customer_reviews.title: Great house well built
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves this house hours of play!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you know what you’re getting
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it it was so easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Faye Brewster

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant Colors!
customer_reviews.text: Nice vibrant colors! It’s exactly what we needed without making a big investment.
customer_reviews.author: Sencera Grei

customer_reviews.title: 6year old kid spends hours playing in his house
customer_reviews.text: 6year old boy. Love his house!! Spent hours play in and out side of it
customer_reviews.author: Juan Luis Redden

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: My 15 month old granddaughter loves the Country Cottage Indoor Playhouse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter likes it.
customer_reviews.text: This was for my granddaughter and she likes it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: The product was horrible. I got so frustrated trying to assemble it ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was horrible. I got so frustrated trying to assemble it that I threw it away. There was no way to attach the roof and I followed instructions very carefully. Holes were in the wrong place. Do not BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Know what you're buying
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know it was cardboard it's shoddy breaking in places.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: My daughter so happy when she had it, thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Easy to assemble. Big playroom impact for a very reasonable price. It's basically, a dressed up box. Kids LOVE boxes. Go figure. All this technology and boxes are still the fave!
customer_reviews.author: HealthNut

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous product
customer_reviews.text: Warning dangerous product The edges are very and they make you cuts when you assembly it...... Kid kids can also get cuts and paper cuts so please stay away from this product
customer_reviews.author: SY WB

customer_reviews.title: My Phoenix loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! Santa came during nap time to drop this off early ;-) my husband and I love that we can fit in there also to play with her! Going to add some pictures and a soft lite toy since it’s very dark inside.
customer_reviews.author: Phylicia Robinson

product_meta.title: Melissa & Doug Country Cottage Indoor Playhouse
product_meta.description:
There's plenty of room to set up house and let imaginations grow in this roomy and charming cottage! This large, sturdy corrugated playhouse stands more than 4 feet tall and is covered with vibrant, full-color artwork. Packed with playful details, like a vegetable garden, tire swing, and ivy-covered chimney, the playhouse includes front doors and window shutters that open and close, a working mail slot, and windows on all 4 sides to let in lots of light. Kids ages 3 and older will make this their home base for imaginative play for years to come!

Our indoor playhouse for is extra large to give multiple kids room to play together, which not only allows young imaginations to grow, but improves social skills and provides an excellent screen-free, open-ended play option. The County Cottage Indoor Playhouse makes a great gift for kids ages 3 years and up. This indoor playhouse measures 54” H x 39” W x 33.4” L and weighs 10.5 pounds.

For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News calls “the gold standard in early childhood play.” We design every toy to the highest quality standards, and to nurture minds and hearts. If your child is not inspired, give us a call and we’ll make it right. Our phone number is on every product!

Adult assembly required
feature_bullets: ROOMY AND STURDY INDOOR PLAYHOUSE: The Melissa & Doug Country Cottage Indoor Playhouse is a 4-foot-tall indoor playhouse made of extra-thick and sturdy corrugate cardboard, featuring vibrant, full-color exterior artwork.

IT’S ALL IN THE DETAILS: This playhouse includes front doors and shutters that open and close on each side, plus several playful details including a chimney, working mail slot, illustrated tire swing, and vegetable garden.

HELPS DEVELOP MULTIPLE SKILLS: Our indoor playhouse is extra big to give multiple kids room to play together. This not only allows young imaginations to grow but improves social skills and provides an excellent screen-free, open-ended play option.

GREAT GIFT FOR AGES 3 AND UP: The County Cottage Indoor Playhouse makes an ideal gift for kids ages 3 years and up. Add the Melissa & Doug Let’s Play House! Dust! Sweep! Mop! Pretend Play Set for another hands-on play option.

“THE GOLD STANDARD IN CHILDHOOD PLAY”: For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News calls “the gold standard in early childhood play.”

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
